title: Wild Scallion
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Gluten free and dairy free eatery that's mostly vegan except for honey (ask) and chicken. Sources local ingredients from the Okanagan. Casual atmosphere with local art and an open stage for music. Drinks include local organic beer, wine, fresh pressed juices, house-made ginger tea, coffee with coconut milk and raw cane sugar. All desserts are raw. Main dishes are accompanied by rice or mixed grains and a salad.
